sources.title: The Screaming Skull
sources.description: A widower remarries and the couple move into the house he shared with his previous wife. Only the ghost of the last wife might still be hanging around. Find out more about this film on it's IMDB page .

sources.title: The Screaming Skull
sources.description: A newlywed couple arrives at the home of the husband's late wife, where the gardens have been maintained by a gardener faithful to the dead woman's memory. Soon eerie events lead the new wife to think she is going out of her mind. - IMDB Description

sources.title: The Screaming Skull
sources.description: This film has fallen into the Public Domain.

sources.title: The Screaming Skull (1958)
sources.description: Newlyweds Eric and Jenni Whitlock retire to his desolate mansion, where Eric's first wife Marianne died from a mysterious freak accident. Jenni, who has a history of mental illness, begins to see strange things including a mysterious skull, which may or may not be a product of her imagination. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-screaming-skull-1958/

sources.title: The Screaming Skull (1958) HORROR
sources.description:
Starring: 1954 Mercedes-Benz 300 SL Coupe 
Co-stars: John Hudson, Peggy Webber, Russ Conway
Director: Alex Nicol

Eerie events at the gothic mansion once owned by her husband's late wife, lead a newlywed to believe she is losing her mind... or is someone trying to scare her to death?

sources.title: The Screaming Skull 1958
sources.description: 1958 Horror movie directed by Alex Nicol. John Hudson and Peggy Webber star. You can find out more about The Screaming Skull at A Passion For Horror .

sources.title: The Screaming Skull (HD)
sources.description: HD version of the 1958 "B" horror feature. A newlywed couple move into the man's old home, which was previously inhabited by him and his previous wife. Strange happenings abound, leading the new wife to think she may be going mad.

metadata.Plot: Newlyweds Eric and Jenni Whitlock retire to his desolate mansion, where Eric's first wife Marianne died from a mysterious freak accident. Jenni, who has a history of mental illness, begins to see strange things including a mysterious skull, which may or may not be a product of her imagination. Suspicion falls on Mickey, the estate's mentally challenged gardener, who was seemingly was very attached to his former mistress.
metadata.Actors: John Hudson, Peggy Webber, Russ Conway
